name: WTheory Web Design Studio
description: Strategic web design studio based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. We combine business strategy with world-class design to create websites that drive sales growth. Our team includes Harvard alumni, top design school graduates, and business leaders.

services.name: Strategic Web Design
services.description: Comprehensive strategic review and business-focused web design that drives measurable sales growth and ROI.

services.name: User Experience (UX) Design
services.description: Research-driven UX design that prioritizes user needs and business objectives through the Design Thinking Framework.

services.name: Responsive Web Development
services.description: Mobile-first, accessible, SEO-optimized web development using modern technologies and best practices.

services.name: Business Strategy & Consulting
services.description: Strategic business review, competitive analysis, and growth consulting led by Harvard-trained strategists.

pages.title: WTheory - Strategic Web Design Studio | Toronto
pages.description: Portfolio of strategic web design projects for industrial, nonprofit, and arts organizations. Effective web designs aligned with business strategy and financial goals.

pages.title: Our Design Process | WTheory
pages.description: Learn about our six-phase Design Thinking process: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Test, Develop, Launch. Expert design for business goals through user needs.

pages.title: Frequently Asked Questions | WTheory Toronto Web Design
pages.description: Comprehensive answers about WTheory's web design services, team, process, pricing, and Toronto-based meeting locations. Serving clients across Canada.

pages.title: Contact WTheory | Toronto Web Design Studio
pages.description: Get in touch with WTheory for strategic web design services. Email: support@wtheory.com. Toronto-based, serving clients across Canada.

pages.title: Legal Policies | WTheory
pages.description: Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, Accessibility Statement, and Cookie Policy for West Solution Consulting Corp. (WTheory). PIPEDA, AODA, and WCAG compliant.

team.description: Our multidisciplinary team combines strategic thinking, design excellence, and technical expertise.
qualifications: Top Design School Graduates (OCAD, Emily Carr, RISD, Parsons)

serviceArea.coverage: Canada-wide (Vancouver, Montreal, Calgary, Ottawa, Edmonton, Halifax, Winnipeg)
meetingLocations: Higher education institutions (University of Toronto, Ryerson/TMU, OCAD, York)
Virtual meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet)

accessibility: AODA (Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act)
privacy: PIPEDA (Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act)

pricing.paymentTerms: Milestone-based (30-50% deposit, progress payments, final upon launch)
pricing.financing: Extended payment plans available for qualified clients
